          <title>
            <string language="es">El cuento</string>
            <string language="en">The story</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Geschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'histoire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A história</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La storia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ιστορία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Conocimiento del género a través del análisis de un cuento de 'El Conde Lucanor', de D. Juan Manuel.</string>
            <string language="en">Learning about the genre by analysing the story 'Count Lucanor' by Don Juan Manuel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="es">Cuento</string>
            <string language="en">story</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Textos narrativos</string>
            <string language="en">Narrative texts</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Lernen über das Genren, indem es die 
Geschichte ' Zählimpuls Lucanor ' analysiert, zieht vorbei Juan 
Manuel an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se renseigner sur le genre en analysant 
l'histoire 'compte Lucanor 'met près Juan Manuel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprender sobre o genre analisando a história ' 
contagem Lucanor ' don perto Juan Manuel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imparando circa il genere analizzando la 
storia 'il conteggio Lucanor 'vicino indossa Juan Manuel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκμάθηση για το ύφος με την ανάλυση της ιστορίας 
"αρίθμηση Lucanor" από Don Juan Manuel.</string>
          </description>
